CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 6, 1960, pg. A5 reads: "Garden Party Hostesses - A charming group of hostesses, who accentuated the Oriental theme of the AME Zion Pittsburgh District's Japanese garden party on the lawn of Wesley Center Church last Sunday afternoon and served refreshments to the teeming host, were ordered to pause for a picture. Little Charlene Foggie, center front, represented the Buds of Promise.  Others, left to right, are Dorothy Redwing of McKees Rocks; Joyce Sharpe and Mrs. C.H. Foggie of Wesley Center; Gwendolyn Yarborough, Southview; Mrs. A.L. Pierce, John Wesley, and Rita Reynolds of Washington. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of garden party hostesses, including: Dorothy Redwing, Joyce Sharpe, Madeline Sharpe Foggie, Gwendolyn Yarborough, Mrs. A.L. Pierce, Esther Nixon, Mrs. John Wesley, and Rita Reynolds, with Charlene Foggie, standing in center, posed on steps of Wesley Center AME Zion Church, Hill District, another version
